Ask HN: As a caregiver how to achieve things
text:
I am in mid 30's and last year my partner was diagnosed with a rare life threatening disease. Everything turned upside down, currently things are holding up fine..But I am stuck.

As a immigrant in US I am worried about possible medical bills would like to accumulate some money, but feel my hands are tied.

1. My partner can't possibly work.

2. Changing to high paying job requires quite a effort and because of my Job and caregiver duties I don't have much time left to prepare for interviews

3. I would not be eligible for FLMA in the first year of employment, so not sure if it's a wise decision to change a job.

Asking for suggestions to manage this phase and how to navigate this.

title: Installing chocolatey may leave your PC vulnerable
text:
The install instructions listed at https://chocolatey.org/install wants you to set the windows powershell's execution policy to unrestricted.

> Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force

There is no instruction step listed to change it back. Many Dart users may have left it that way, open to numerous scripts run unrestricted on their PC.

To top this, they have a pretty NOTE at step 2 boasting 'they take security seriously'.

Ask HN: Is being a independent freelance web developer still feasible?
text: Between webflow, wix and squarspace.. it seems the people who could benefit from having a web developer develop them a website is narrower than ever. Are you successful in building things from scratch as standalone person/company not "consultant" who is really a contractor at another tech company?
